title: Apple Growth Is Stuck. The iPhone Could Be a Loser.
text: Consensus estimates call for revenue to be down slightly from a year ago. But a legion of bullish analysts see better growth ahead.

title: Big Ten mulls more West Coast expansion if Pac-12 crumbles
text: A group of Big Ten presidents has begun discussing the possibility of adding more West Coast schools to the conference if the Pac-12 continues to crumble, two people familiar with the conversations told The Associated Press on Wednesday.

title: Mediocre Earnings After the Bell; Selloff Continues
text: August looks to be giving back a significant amount of July gains, just in the first two days of the new month's trading.

title: Dow Jones Today: Index Dives on Rating Cut
text: Investors reacted to the Fitch Rating agency's downgrade of U.S. credit, sending long-term bonds higher and the Dow Jones lower by about 1%, or 350 points.

title: Apple savings account racks up $10 billion in deposits since April debut
text: Apple Inc. has amassed upwards of $10 billion in deposits for its savings account since launching the product with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. in April, the company announced Wednesday.

title: World's 10 Richest People Lose $27 Billion As Tech Stocks Sink
text: History suggests the federal debt rating downgrade won't impact stocks for long, as stocks continued their upward trajectory after a brief blip in the aftermath of the S&P's similar decision 12 years ago.

title: Apple Inc iPhone sales upside likely in 3Q results: analysts
text: Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL) investors will likely see upside in iPhone revenues when the consumer electronics giant reports its third-quarter 2023 financial results after the closing bell on August 3, according to Wedbush Securities analysts.   In a note to clients, they maintained their ‘Outperform' rating on the stock and 12-month target price of $220 per share, while stating that the iPhone maker is gaining market share in China.

title: Big Money Still Buying These 9 Stocks After Huge Rally; Tesla Stock Is Among Them
text: Stocks funds are buying: TSLA, GOOGL, META, NFLX, TDG, FSLR, AAPL, ADBE and TDG are among stocks funds are buying amid earnings season.

title: Will Slowing Services Growth Hurt Apple's (AAPL) Q3 Earnings?
text: Apple's (AAPL) third-quarter fiscal 2023 results are expected to reflect a slowing Services business.

title: 'Another flex the muscles moment': Here's what Wall Street expects from Apple's upcoming earnings report
text: All eyes are on Apple as the iPhone maker reports its fiscal third-quarter earnings results on Thursday. The world's largest company is expected to show continued resiliency in growth in its Services business.

title: Apple, Amazon to Report Earnings: ETFs in Spotlight
text: The two of the world's largest corporations -- Apple (AAPL) and Amazon (AMZN) -- are in the spotlight as both are set to release earnings on Aug 3.

title: Earnings Previews: Airbnb, Amazon, Apple
text: After U.S. markets closed on Tuesday, AMD beat both earnings per share (EPS) and revenue estimates and issued third-quarter guidance in line with Wall Street estimates.

title: Why Apple (AAPL) Might Surprise This Earnings Season
text: Apple (AAPL) is seeing favorable earnings estimate revision activity and has a positive Zacks Earnings ESP heading into earnings season.

title: 3 Things About Apple That Smart Investors Know
text: Apple's stock has risen over 50% in 2023. The company has proven resilient by gaining market share amid economically challenging conditions.
